name: Animal Alphas
description:
A game made during 2020 Secret Santa Jam (https://itch.io/jam/secret-santa).

 The game was made based on a letter we got from a fellow developer. We took the inspiration from roguelike games and
Doom, and mashed it together and the result became Animal Alphas. 

A first person roguelike game, with randomly created levels. You play as a a soldier carrying a ancient shield with the power of reflect anything that collides with it. Your goal is to cleanse the world from the mutated animals caused by humanitys pollution of mother earth.

Animal Alpha was made during 2 weekends by two developers.

Programming / Game design : Fabian Hugert

Programming / Game design : Alexander Brierly Chramer
